title: The provisions which are mentioned in the said Regulations shall prevail over the corresponding provisions of the Unified Development Control and Promotion Regulations (hereinafter referred to as ―UDCPR‖)
clause_text: The provisions which are mentioned in the said Regulations shall prevail over the corresponding provisions of the Unified Development Control and Promotion Regulations (hereinafter referred to as ―UDCPR‖). In case of any conflict or ambiguity, in respect of any matters not specifically mentioned in the said Regulations, the relevant provisions of the UDCPR, as modified from time to time; shall be applicable.
section: Provisions of the said Regulations shall be applicable to :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
